Pisces.premonition: Soft, comforting, and a little dreamy. This week, don't let your emotions turn you into mush-stand firm, even when life's boiling hot.
Pisces.sauce_pairing: Lobster Cream Sauce - luxurious, indulgent, and pairs perfectly with your deep emotional side.

Aquarius.premonition: Quirky, unique, and marching to your own boil. This week, embrace your individuality, but don't get too lost in your thoughts-stay grounded like a well-drained noodle.
Aquarius.sauce_pairing: Walnut Pesto - unconventional, nutty, and totally underrated (just like your ideas).
